H0.text: In the book by James Hilton what was the full surname of the character Mr Chips. Chipping

A4.text: The novella tells the story of a beloved school teacher, Mr Chipping.

A5.text: Goodbye, Mr. Chips is a novella about the life of a school teacher, Mr. Chipping.
